backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend files and components for UPSC papers section and navigation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend components and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color variables, themes, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the LandingPage and global Toaster component.
frontend/src/components/PreviousYearPape: Displays categorized UPSC Prelims and Mains papers using cards with disabled download buttons.
frontend/src/components/ShareThisApp.tsx: Share component allowing users to copy the current URL with feedback via toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with warm academic palette, dark mode, and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: React landing page with hero, features, branding, and a button that scrolls to the previous-year-papers section.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, features implemented, requirements, and app-specific metadata for upscQueen.
